Banner.Description: I am a Software Developer with experience in .NET, C#, Angular, React, Next.js and critical integrations between corporate systems such as ERP Senior, TOTVS and Salesforce. I focus on security, scalability, observability and best practices for maintainability. On the backend, I work with .NET, ASP.NET Core, microservices, DDD, and relational/NoSQL databases. On the frontend, I build modern and responsive interfaces with Angular, React, and Next.js. I also work with infrastructure using Docker, Kubernetes, Linux, Windows Server, RabbitMQ, and Kafka.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am passionate about technology, with solid experience in developing integrations and scalable solutions in corporate environments. I have mainly worked with .NET and C#, building APIs, services, and mission-critical integrations.

Besides backend, I also work with Angular, React, and Next.js, ensuring excellent user experiences. I apply modern DevOps practices, using Docker, Kubernetes, messaging systems (RabbitMQ, Kafka), and cloud (AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud).
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full-Stack Developer | .NET & Laravel
Description: Development and maintenance of integrations in .NET and Laravel (REST and SOAP).
Applied best practices in structured logging, metrics, and tracing.
Critical integrations between Salesforce and ERP Senior Sapiens.
Worked on support and bug fixing for critical issues in integrations.

Experience.Jobs.Title: CEO & Founder
Description: Founder of a startup specialized in developing websites, mobile apps, and system integrations.
Definition of modern and scalable architecture with best development practices.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Systems Analyst
Description: Developed improvements and automations in ERP TOTVS RM (C#, Formula Visual).
Web development in Fluig using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, and AngularJS.
Created reports in RM Reports, metadata, and advanced SQL cubes.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Junior Support Analyst
Description: Handled N1 and N2 support, focusing on Finance, Purchasing, Maintenance, Accounting, and Tax modules in TOTVS RM.
Provided support with data analysis using SQL.
